mapper.insert:
SELECT , ,
INTO TEMP "TmpHeijunkaMae" FROM rgdb."DbV2002Fuka" AS "DbT2002Fuka" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT2003Kibetsu" AS "DbT2003Kibetsu" ON "DbT2002Fuka"."choteiNendo" = "DbT2003Kibetsu"."choteiNendo" AND "DbT2002Fuka"."fukaNendo" = "DbT2003Kibetsu"."fukaNendo" AND "DbT2002Fuka"."tsuchishoNo" = "DbT2003Kibetsu"."tsuchishoNo" AND "DbT2002Fuka"."rirekiNo" = "DbT2003Kibetsu"."rirekiNo" AND "DbT2003Kibetsu"."choshuHouhou" = '1' AND "DbT2003Kibetsu"."ki" = 2 INNER JOIN rgdb."UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" AS "UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu" ON "DbT2003Kibetsu"."choteiId" = "UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu"."choteiId" AND "UrT0705ChoteiKyotsu"."choteigaku" > 0 WHERE "DbT2002Fuka"."choteiNendo" = #{調定年度} AND "DbT2002Fuka"."fukaNendo" = #{賦課年度} ORDER BY "DbT2002Fuka"."tsuchishoNo"
CREATE TEMP TABLE "TmpTaishogai" AS SELECT * FROM "TmpHeijunkaMae" WHERE 1 = 2

insert.id: alter対象外データTemp備考コード

mapper.insert: ALTER TABLE "TmpTaishogai" ADD "hokenryoDankaiKarisanntei" character varying(3), ADD "tokuchoKibetsuChoteigaku1" numeric(20,0), ADD "tokuchoKibetsuChoteigaku2" numeric(20,0), ADD "tokuchoKibetsuChoteigaku3" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku1" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku2" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku3" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku4" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku5" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku6" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku7" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku8" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku9" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku10" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku11" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku12" numeric(20,0), ADD "備考コード" text
CREATE TEMP TABLE "TmpTaishosha" AS SELECT * FROM "TmpHeijunkaMae" WHERE 1 = 2

insert.id: alter対象者データTemp備考コード

mapper.insert: ALTER TABLE "TmpTaishosha" ADD "hokenryoDankaiKarisanntei" character varying(3), ADD "tokuchoKibetsuChoteigaku1" numeric(20,0), ADD "tokuchoKibetsuChoteigaku2" numeric(20,0), ADD "tokuchoKibetsuChoteigaku3" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku1" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku2" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku3" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku4" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku5" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku6" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku7" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku8" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku9" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku10" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku11" numeric(20,0), ADD "fuchoKibetsuChoteigaku12" numeric(20,0), ADD "備考コード" text

CREATE TEMP TABLE "TmpHeijunkaKeisanKeka" ("henkogoTokuShoKibetsgaku1" numeric(12,0), "henkogoTokuShoKibetsgaku2" numeric(12,0), "henkogoTokuShoKibetsgaku3" numeric(12,0), "tsuchishoNo" rgdb."DbUDD008TsuchishoNo" )
INSERT INTO "TmpHeijunkaKeisanKeka" VALUES ( #{変更後特徴期別額_１期}, #{変更後特徴期別額_２期}, #{変更後特徴期別額_３期}, #{通知書番号} )
mapper.select: SELECT 計算後情報.*, , 年金特徴回付情報."dtTokubetsuChoshuGimushaCode" FROM rgdb."DbT2015KeisangoJoho" AS 計算後情報 LEFT JOIN rgue."UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho" AS 年金特徴回付情報 ON 計算後情報."kariNenkinNo" = 年金特徴回付情報."kisoNenkinNo" AND 計算後情報."kariNenkinCode" = 年金特徴回付情報."nenkinCode" AND 計算後情報."kariHosokuM" = 年金特徴回付情報."hosokuTsuki" LEFT JOIN "TmpHeijunkaKeisanKeka" AS 平準化計算結果Temp ON 計算後情報."tsuchishoNo" = 平準化計算結果Temp."tsuchishoNo" INNER JOIN rgua."UaFt200FindShikibetsuTaisho"('','',TRUE,'DB',FALSE,'','','','','','','','','','','',true, '','','','','','','',true,'','','','','','','','','','','',true,true,true,true,true,true,true,true,true,true, true,'','','','','','','','',true,'','',true,true,true,'','','','','','','','','','','','','','','','','','','{}') AS "ShikibetsuTaisho" ON "ShikibetsuTaisho"."shikibetsuCode" = 計算後情報."shikibetsuCode" WHERE 計算後情報."choteiNendo" = #{調定年度} AND 計算後情報."fukaNendo" = #{賦課年度} AND (計算後情報."koseiZengoKubun" = '2' OR 計算後情報."koseiZengoKubun" = '1') AND 計算後情報."sakuseiShoriName" = '特徴平準化計算_6月分' AND 計算後情報."choteiNichiji" = #{調定日時} AND 年金特徴回付情報."tsuchiNaiyoCode" in ('00', '30') AND 年金特徴回付情報."shoriNendo" = #{調定前年度} ${出力順}

result.property: 特別徴収義務者コード

mapper.select: SELECT 対象外データTemp.*, , 年金特徴回付情報."dtTokubetsuChoshuGimushaCode", 徴収方法Newest."kariNenkinCode" FROM "TmpTaishogai" AS 対象外データTemp INNER JOIN "DbV2001ChoshuHoho" AS 徴収方法Newest ON 対象外データTemp."dbT2002Fuka_fukaNendo" = 徴収方法Newest."fukaNendo" AND 対象外データTemp."dbT2002Fuka_hihokenshaNo" = 徴収方法Newest."hihokenshaNo" LEFT JOIN rgue."UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho" AS 年金特徴回付情報 ON 徴収方法Newest."kariNenkinNo" = 年金特徴回付情報."kisoNenkinNo" AND 徴収方法Newest."kariNenkinCode" = 年金特徴回付情報."nenkinCode" AND 徴収方法Newest."kariHosokuM" = 年金特徴回付情報."hosokuTsuki" INNER JOIN rgua."UaFt200FindShikibetsuTaisho"('','',TRUE,'DB',FALSE,'','','','','','','','','','','',true, '','','','','','','',true,'','','','','','','','','','','',true,true,true,true,true,true,true,true,true,true, true,'','','','','','','','',true,'','',true,true,true,'','','','','','','','','','','','','','','','','','','{}') AS "ShikibetsuTaisho" ON 対象外データTemp."dbT2002Fuka_shikibetsuCode" = "ShikibetsuTaisho"."shikibetsuCode" WHERE 対象外データTemp."dbT2002Fuka_choteiNendo" = #{調定年度} AND 対象外データTemp."dbT2002Fuka_fukaNendo" = #{賦課年度} AND 年金特徴回付情報."tsuchiNaiyoCode" in ('00', '30') AND 年金特徴回付情報."shoriNendo" = #{調定前年度} ${出力順}

result.property: 特別徴収義務者コード
徴収方法Newest_仮徴収_年金コード
